00044 class PQXX_LIBEXPORT Trigger
00045 {

00052   Trigger(Connection &C, PGSTD::string N) :                             //[t4]
00053     m_Conn(C), m_Name(N) { m_Conn.AddTrigger(this); }

00055   virtual ~Trigger() { m_Conn.RemoveTrigger(this); }                    //[t4]
